duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the month end closing & reporting for North America (US & Canada), including journal entries, accruals & preparation of the financial statements.
Prepare necessary analysis to ensure accuracy of the Balance Sheet, P&L and Trial Balance.
Prepare adhoc financial analysis and support of cross-functional financial analysis needs for Marketing, Sales, Operations, etc.
Work with Accounts Receivable to assist in keeping the AR Aging up to date and free of erroneous entries.
Assist in process improvement capabilities to reduce non-value added tasks and increase analysis that can drive business agility.
Continuous communication with the Ricola Global Reporting team and the Ricola Local Leadership team to ensure all adjustments are posted timely to reflect the changing business and Swiss GAAP.
Participate in annual audit & budget process.
Assist in leading the team in proper utilization of appropriate systems including SAP, Power BI, Exceedra, etc.
